title: Check if a List Includes All Values | Challenge
description: In this challenge, you will create a function that checks if all the values in a given list are included in another list, using a for loop and the in operator.

meta.title: Python List Inclusion Check | Programming Tutorials
meta.description: Learn how to check if all the values in one list are included in another list using Python. Useful for verifying user input and more.
meta.keywords: python, list, inclusion, check, programming, tutorials
